summary: This document contains various records related to the registration and ownership of the Gulfstream Aerospace GV-SP (G550) aircraft with serial number 5173. It includes details about the aircraft's registration, ownership by N550GP LLC, and various FAA forms and agreements related to its operation and registration status.

persons.name: Kevin R. West
persons.context: Kevin R. West is mentioned as the Acting Manager of the Aircraft Registration Branch at the FAA, responsible for signing the temporary certificate of registration.

persons.name: Amy Shilling
persons.context: Amy Shilling is noted as the person who filed the registration documents for the aircraft.

persons.name: Richard Munkvold
persons.context: Richard Munkvold is identified as the Manager of N550GP LLC, signing various documents related to the aircraft's registration.

connections.description: N550GP, LLC is borrowing from Bank of Hope, as evidenced by the Aircraft Security Agreement.
Richard Munkvold is the Manager of N550GP, LLC, indicating a direct ownership and management relationship.

events.title: Temporary Certificate of Registration Issued
events.description: A temporary certificate of registration for the Gulfstream Aerospace GV-SP (G550) aircraft was issued, valid until August 21, 2021.

events.title: Aircraft Security Agreement Signed
events.description: N550GP, LLC entered into an Aircraft Security Agreement with Bank of Hope, granting a security interest in the aircraft.

locations: 2151 E Convention Center Way Ste 222, Ontario, CA 91764
3200 Wilshire Blvd, 7th Floor, Los Angeles, CA 90010
keyFacts: The aircraft is registered under N550GP LLC, located at 2151 E Convention Center Way, Ontario, CA.
The aircraft's serial number is 5173, and it is a Gulfstream Aerospace GV-SP (G550).
Richard Munkvold is the Manager of N550GP LLC and has signed multiple documents related to the aircraft's registration.
